statements: UPDATE geospatial_data SET location = ST_GeographyFromText('POINT(-122.349358 47.620192)'), value = 100.50 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE geospatial_data SET location = ST_GeographyFromText('POINT(-71.060316 42.358894)'), value = 75.25 WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE geospatial_data SET location = ST_GeographyFromText('POINT(-74.0060 40.7128)'), value = 120.75 WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE locations SET location_name = 'New York' WHERE location_id = 1;
UPDATE spatial_data SET data_value = 10.5 WHERE data_id = 1;
UPDATE locations SET latitude = 40.7128, longitude = -74.0060 WHERE location_name = 'New York';
UPDATE locations SET street_address = '123 Main St' WHERE location_id = '2b71a49e-b311-493e-b10f-0d65099c1f2a';
UPDATE users SET email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE user_id = '3dab20d8-70ec-4d4c-ac2b-e2ecc4bcaa98';
UPDATE geo_analysis SET analysis_result = 'Approved' WHERE analysis_id = '41e6c5e1-03c5-4a87-b4ee-191b08d8c2c8';
UPDATE locations SET name = 'New York City' WHERE location_id = 1;
UPDATE regions SET area = ST_GeomFromText('POLYGON((0 0,0 10,10 10,10 0,0 0))') WHERE region_id = 1;
UPDATE customers SET email = 'new@email.com' WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE locations SET location_name = 'New Location Name' WHERE location_id = 1
UPDATE regions SET region_name = 'New Region Name' WHERE region_id = 1
UPDATE points_of_interest SET poi_name = 'New POI Name' WHERE poi_id = 1
